articles.title: Why are Paris St-Germain struggling to hit top form?
articles.description: European champions PSG face Newcastle in the Champions League on Wednesday - but why have Luis Enrique's side not been at their best so far this term?

articles.title: East meets west London - the mentor who changed Chelsea
articles.description: Vinay Menon knew nothing about football when he went for a meeting at a west London mansion in 2009. A few weeks later he was in the heart of the Chelsea dressing room.

articles.title: From farming village to Liverpool icon - the Salah story
articles.description: BBC Sport visits Egypt to discover what Mohamed Salah means to the people of the football-mad country, and how a small boy from humble beginnings became a national icon.

articles.title: Inside Man City's rebuild and plan for life without Guardiola
articles.description: BBC Sport looks at Manchester City's evolution and why the January window has offered renewed belief.

articles.title: A 'special' snooker player who became a TV star - John Virgo obituary
articles.description: John Virgo was an excellent snooker player, a hugely popular TV figure, and one of the great voices of his beloved sport.

articles.title: All the done deals on deadline day in one place
articles.description: Check out the significant signings and departures in the Premier League, Scottish Premiership, EFL and Women's Super League.

articles.title: Fishlock has 'had conversations' over Wales role
articles.description: Jess Fishlock says she is "fleshing out the details" over a potential role with Wales following her retirement from international football.

articles.title: Bayern legend? How Kane is viewed in Germany as contract talks begin
articles.description: Harry Kane is entering the final 18 months of his Bayern Munich contract, and the German champions are eager to keep the prolific striker, as German football writer Constantin Eckner explains.

articles.title: Barca president unhappy at teen's 'unpleasant' PSG move
articles.description: PSG sign 18-year-old Barcelona midfielder Dro Fernandez, with the Spanish side's president calling the situation around the transfer "unpleasant".

articles.title: Which countries haven't had a Premier League player?
articles.description: Our Ask Me Anything team explore which countries have not been represented in the Premier League.

articles.title: What do you get for winning EFL Cup?
articles.description: BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team explains what the winner of the Carabao Cup gets.

articles.title: The talented playmaker no-one seems to want
articles.description: Harvey Elliott is one of England's most gifted young players - but neither Aston Villa or Liverpool appear to rate the midfielder.

articles.title: Napoli 'smell blood' & target Premier League's discarded stars
articles.description: After Scott McTominay was a hit, Napoli went back to the Premier League for Kevin de Bruyne, could more players follow them to Serie A?

articles.title: I've realised I can make a difference - Hoy
articles.description: In a new BBC documentary, Sir Chris Hoy shows how he is using his Olympic mindset to reframe his purpose following a terminal cancer diagnosis.

articles.title: Rejections, depression & promise to his mum - Thiago's route to top
articles.description: Igor Thiago's route to the Premier League has been far from straightforward - BBC Sport charts the rise of Brentford's record-breaking Brazilian striker.

articles.title: The great number nine decline - where have England's strikers gone?
articles.description: BBC Sport takes an in-depth look at why England lack centre-forward options behind Harry Kane - a far cry from when the likes of Les Ferdinand only won 17 caps.

articles.title: Eddie takes up ski jumping to try and become an Olympian
articles.description: Feel-good drama starring Taron Egerton and Hugh Jackman

articles.title: Eddie takes up ski jumping to try and become an Olympian
articles.description: Feel-good drama starring Taron Egerton and Hugh Jackman

articles.title: Sutton's predictions v Gladiators star Apollo
articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Gladiators star Apollo and AI with his predictions for this week's Premier League fixtures.

articles.title: Extra: Revisiting London City Lionesses with Godfrey, Cascarino and Van de Donk
articles.description: Ben Haines is back at Cobdown Park to catch up with a trio of London City Lionesses.
